item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> About - Swen Kuh Swen Kuh About Post Quotes Contact Swen Kuh Swen Kuh About Post Quotes Contact About About Hi! I’m Swen Kuh (last name pronounced as k-oo-h). My first name actually has two words and I’ve also published under F. Swen Kuh. I’m currently a Research Fellow in Statistics at the University of Adelaide (contract transfer from Monash University due to the relocation of my supervisor). I am now working remotely in Melbourne with Dr.

item.title: Base rate fallacy
item.description: Today I was reading about Base Rate Fallacy on Odds & Ends by Jonathan Weisberg, which is a textbook for introductory philosophy courses on probability and inductive logic, freely available on his website here. The chapter also starts off with this quote, …in no other branch of mathematics is it so easy for experts to blunder as in probability theory. —Martin Gardner It resonates as I have been learning statistics for almost the better half of my life, and yet there are still so many concepts and things that challenge my understanding of it.

item.title: Getting started
item.description: This is my first post on the new website using Hugo. I will figure out how to add other widgets and also hopefully document any work related information here.
